com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class Pane

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.Pane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Pane
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

Applies only to polar charts and angular gauges. This configuration object holds general options for the combined X- and Y- axes set. Each XAxis or YAxis can reference the pane by index.

See Also:

public void setEndAngle(Number endAngle)
Sets the end angle of the polar X-axis or gauge value axis, given in degrees where 0 is north. Defaults to startAngle + 360.

Parameters:

setCenterXY

public void setCenterXY(String x,
                        String y)
Sets the center of a polar chart or angular gauge. Positions can be given as integers that transform to pixels, or as percentages of the plot area size. Defaults to ['50%', '50%'].

Parameters:
x - The X-coordinate in percent
y - The Y-coordinate in percent

setCenterXY

public void setCenterXY(Number x,
                        Number y)
Sets the center of a polar chart or angular gauge. Positions can be given as integers that transform to pixels, or as percentages of the plot area size. Defaults to ['50%', '50%'].

Parameters:
x - The X-coordinate in pixels
y - The Y-coordinate in pixels
